name: Dreadwood (RuiLSilva)
description:
In the future the air is to thin for anyone to breathe, good thing you`re a time traveller. Jump between the past and the future to discover what killed off all the trees while you try to prevent them from ever dying at all.

Controls: 

Arrow Keys - Movement

Shift - Jump

Q - Time travel to the future

E - Time travel to the past

Left Click - Place a bomb

Credits: 

Developers:

Mo Abdulaziz

Jack Conroy

Artist:

Thom Jennings

Designers:

Rui Silva

Brandon Osborne

Special Thanks:

Chris Cox

Created in 48 hours for the 2022 Global Game Jam.
